name: δ-Norm Invariant
statement\_igsoa: Any internal reparameterization of δ consistent with μ and Ω preserves ||δ||.
statement\_standard: Norm-preserving reparameterizations correspond to isometries of the underlying metric.
sketch: 1. Define δ as a section of the tangent bundle with metric induced by μ.
3. Show that ||δ|| is invariant under μ-isometries.
